mosinstall.name: Random Image
mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: This module display a random image from your chosen directory

param.name: type
param.label: Image Type
param.description: Type of image PNG/GIF/JPG etc. (default is JPG)

param.name: folder
param.label: Image Folder
param.description: Path to the image folder relative to the site url, eg: images/stories

param.name: link
param.label: Link
param.description: A URL to redirect to if image is clicked on, eg: http://www.joomla.org

param.name: width
param.label: Width (px)
param.description: Image width (forces all images to be displayed with this width)

param.name: height
param.label: Height (px)
param.description: Image height (forces all images to be displayed with the height)

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
